about.title: About Olorin.ai
about.subtitle: We're pioneering the future of enterprise security with autonomous AI agents that revolutionize fraud prevention and investigation processes.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At Olorin.ai, we believe that every enterprise deserves protection from evolving fraud threats. Our mission is to democratize access to cutting-edge AI technology that can autonomously detect, investigate, and prevent fraud with unprecedented accuracy.
mission.description2: Named after the wise protector from Tolkien's world, Olorin represents our commitment to being the guardian of your digital assets, watching over your business with intelligence, vigilance, and unwavering dedication.
mission.recognitionDesc: Recognized as a leader in AI-powered fraud prevention solutions

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: Numbers that demonstrate our commitment to excellence

security.description: We prioritize the highest levels of security and privacy in everything we build.

innovation.title: AI Innovation
innovation.description: Pushing the boundaries of what's possible with artificial intelligence and machine learning.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: Delivering accurate, reliable solutions that minimize false positives and maximize effectiveness.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: Building long-term relationships with our clients as trusted security partners.

technology.title: Cutting-Edge Technology
technology.description: Our platform leverages the latest advances in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and generative AI to create autonomous agents that think and act like expert fraud investigators.
technology.ctaDescription: Every solution we build starts with AI at its core, ensuring maximum effectiveness and continuous learning capabilities.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Our diverse team of AI researchers, security experts, and industry veterans is dedicated to building the future of fraud prevention.
team.expertiseDesc: Our team combines decades of experience in cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, and enterprise software to deliver solutions that truly make a difference.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

suggestions.title: What can you do?
suggestions.check: Check the URL for any typos or errors
suggestions.back: Go back to the previous page

404.help: Need help? Contact our support team at

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: Something went wrong on our end. Our AI wizards are working to fix this issue as quickly as possible.

details.title: What happened?
details.server: Our server encountered an unexpected condition
details.temporary: This is usually a temporary issue
details.team: Our technical team has been automatically notified

actions.title: What can you try?
actions.refresh: Refresh the page in a few minutes
actions.clear: Clear your browser cache and cookies
actions.try: Try accessing the page from a different browser
actions.contact: Contact our support team if the issue persists
